评论详情: I know for the price, I should have just overlooked them and chose something different. When I received them, they came running pretty small, and were terrible quality.

评论概述: Color leaked and shape of shorts was not for me
评论详情: I bought these for a music festival, i’m very glad i tested them out before because a very small amount of water caused them to leak blueish dye onto my skin and the shorts were much longer than pictured. the pattern was also not the exact same- might as well buy on shein

评论概述: Comfortable but shredded on first wear
评论详情: I bought these because they seemed very lightweight and breathable and also cute. Which they definitely are. I was impressed with how cute they were and i loved the colors and the patterns. However, I packed them to wear on a vacation and within a couple hours of wearing/walking in them the entire inseam of the pants fell apart and shredded. The material is very thin and comfortable but i was very disappointed that the fabric was so fragile. I definitely can't recommend these if you are going to do anything except sit completely still in them. You may need a massive thigh gap in these to be able to walk in them. Not sure how well they would have held up in the washing machine after that either.

The shorts look great, and the material is very thin. I thought it would be nice and breathable- but I squatted down once and it ripped like tissue paper. If you don’t plan on moving at all, these are the shorts for you.

评论概述: Great but shape of shorts are off
评论详情: I love these shorts but the inner part of the shorts are shorter then the outside, making it seem like your thighs eat the shorts - I ordered the pink one as well and the shorts did not have this issue.
These shorts look just like the photo and are a high quality.

评论概述: Cute shorts but I don't care for gold accents.
评论详情: I thought they would be all black & white patterns but mine had some gold foil print accents that made them look cheapish. I haven't washed them yet but will definitely  hand wash in cold since the colors may run. I kept them because they are unique & got them for under $20. Waist band is elastic & tight but will loosen up with wear.
Comfy. Not super flattering on my body type because they are longer than I was hoping for, but not companies problem

Absolutely love love love these shorts. Originally out of the package they were a little stiff and weird shaped but then washed and they lay perfectly. Only complaint is the pockets (while super roomy) are in a weird place on the front. Other than that they got delivered fast and are super comfy and soft.
i got yellow thinking it would look like the picture and they are a bright ugly yellow

I took a chance on these shorts, and I'm glad I did.  I am very pleasantly surprised with the quality of the craftsmanship (made in India), the sizing and the colors.  It's amazing that these shorts are actually pieced work, different rayon fabrics sewn together (thus the threads -easily clipped- that some reviewers commented on).  The size range is comfortable for small to medium (size 2-8), with adequate fabric for a loose fit and large (10-12) if you don't mind a tight elastic waist. The colors and fabrics do not exactly match the photos, but the "general" color is what you get.  I got "white" (has lots of red flowers) and "pink" (which has more oranges).  As long as you realize they are individually hand sewn, you won't be disappointed with the color variations.

The pants look very much like the ones that I ordered, they’re not super long, but the length is a perfect length for me personally. There is only one pocket sewn into the pants, as well as the delivery taking almost 2 weeks. there was no contact from Amazon about delayed delivery until the day after, it was supposed to be delivered, so that was very irritating. The pockets were sewn on backwards! Still very cute, and I do wear them a lot, but it is a little annoying every time I try to put my hands in my pockets.

They’re so cute, I love them. They don’t look exactly like the picture but it gives a little touch. It feels like all the little squares are individually sewn on unlike some other patchwork items on here. They have pockets that are actually deep! And the drawstring is different from the shorts which I think is so cute.
